## RenderScope type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RenderScope<TElement> = {
    __type: string;
    status: number;
    firstChild: RenderScope<TElement> | undefined;
    nextSibling: RenderScope<TElement> | undefined;
    firstDisposable: DisposableNode | undefined;
    element: TElement;
};
```
